entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening then changing to rain showers near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming southeast 40 gusting to 60 this evening then south 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 13 January 2023
